ai-ya1.2.2:1.1_0: Whatever are wholesome things, do they all have the skillful qualities? ...”
ai-ya1.2.2:2.1_0: ‘This is skillful and unskillful qualities aren’t skillful. ...
ai-ya1.2.2:3.1_0: There are unskillful qualities that are skillful ...
ai-ya1.2.2:3.1_2: Whatever things don’t arise ... all things ...
ai-ya1.2.2:3.1_3: their name is the source of name ...
ai-ya1.2.2:4.2_0: with the continuation of existence and the destruction of continuation,
ai-ya1.2.2:5.1_0: The section for recitation on “meaning” is finished.
ai-ya1.2.2:6.1_0: The Book of the roots is finished.
